TEXT.TITLE: CENTEL <CNT> COMPLETES SALE
TEXT.BODY: Centel Corp said it completed the sale of its water properties serving 8,000 customers in four southwestern Kansas communities to Central Kansas Utility Co of Columbia, Mo. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
